page.title: 06Inside the New School
page.content: The New School opened in November 1984.We have got three computers, also a television.In the New School there are curtains at the windows,and a carpet that covers nearly the whole school.There are new books around the school,some of the books are what we had at the old school.In the classrooms it is warm because we have got tall heaters which are attached to the wall.If people are in one of the classrooms the heater will switch itself on,if nobody is in the room it will switch itself off.At this school we have got more P.E.Equipment than we did at the old school.In the new school there are showers and foot baths.In the shower area there is quite alot of room.The doors are not wooden doors to separate the classes they are partitions.
